Content: We created a smart chatbot that answers questions about company documents using Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Think of it like having a helper robot that reads all your company papers and remembers them, so whenever you ask a question, it can look through those papers and give you the answer!
It's a program that runs on a computer, listens for questions from people, and sends back answers
RAG = Retrieval Augmented Generation. It means: Find information + Give smart answers. Like when you search for something in a book AND then explain it in your own words
Uses Azure OpenAI (a super-smart AI from Microsoft). It's like having a really smart tutor that understands questions and can write natural answers that make sense
Uses JWT Tokens (secret passwords). Only lets logged-in users ask questions. Admin can log in with: admin / admin123
